recipe.title: Lemon Yoghurt Cake
recipe.subtitle: Because this cake contains all and yoghurt in place of solid fat, it is very easy to mix.
recipe.ingredients: rind of 2 lemons 1 cup oil 2 eggs 1 3/4 cups sugar 1/2 tsp salt 1 cup plain or flavoured yoghurt 3 Tbsp lemon juice 2 cups self- raising flour
recipe.steps: Grate all the coloured peel from the lemons into a mixing bowl. Add the oil, eggs and sugar and beat until thick and well blended. Add the salt, yoghurt and lemon juice and beat again brieﬂy. Pour cake mixture into a buttered and ﬂoured ring pan and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes, or until the sides start to shrink, the centre springs back when pressed and a skewer comes out clean. Leave to cool for about 10 minutes before turning carefully out onto a rack. Serve sprinkled with a little icing sugar or topped with whipped cream
